entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 26. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
